summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from West Barton Street to West Henderson Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 13719 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
